name: 花霞
summary: Hero is a student in Tokyo university and he's taking part-time job as home tutor. He soon realizes that both heroines who take his lessons have feelings for him, but they are too shy to confess. They study diligently in hope to enter the same university as the hero and confess then. However...
info:
• 中文名: 花霞
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2000/04/28
